Properties.ProtectedString:
--Pararocket
local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Debris = game.Debris
local Tool = script.Parent
local Player local Character local Torso local RightArm local RightGrip
local FlightTime = 5 local DropPlayerTime = FlightTime - 1 local ReloadTime = 10 local RocketThrust = 2
function Launch() Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1 local Rocket = Tool.Handle:Clone() Rocket.Transparency = 0 Rocket.Name = "Rocket" Rocket.Parent = game.Workspace Rocket.Size = Vector3.new(3.35, 6.78, 3.53)
local TorsoWeld = Instance.new("Weld") TorsoWeld.Part0 = Character.Torso TorsoWeld.Part1 = Rocket TorsoWeld.Parent = Rocket TorsoWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0) * CFrame.new(0, -1.4, 1.6)
local CharacterTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CharacterTag.Name = "AttachedPlayer" CharacterTag.Value = Character CharacterTag.Parent = Rocket
local RocketScript = Tool.RocketThrust:Clone() RocketScript.Parent = Rocket RocketScript.Disabled = false
Debris:AddItem(Rocket, FlightTime + 3)
end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivate() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
Launch()
wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
end Tool.Activated:connect(onActivate)
local function onEquip() Character = Tool.Parent Torso = waitForChild(Character, 'Torso') RightArm = waitForChild(Character, 'Right Arm') RightGrip = waitForChild(RightArm, 'RightGrip') RightGrip.Part0 = Torso RightGrip.Part1 = Tool.Handle RightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(1.59999979, -2.20000029, 0, -4.37113883e-008, -1, -4.37113883e-008, 0, -4.37113883e-008, 1, -1, 4.37113883e-008, 1.91068547e-015) delay(.1, function() if Character:FindFirstChild("Backpack") ~= nil then return end local Backpack = Instance.new("Part") Backpack.Position = Torso.Position Backpack.CanCollide = false Backpack.Parent = Torso Backpack.Transparency = 0 Backpack.Name = "Backpack"
local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85027479" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85027535" Mesh.Parent = Backpack
if(Torso:FindFirstChild("BackpackWeld") == nil) then local BackpackWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BackpackWeld.Part0 = Torso BackpackWeld.Part1 = Backpack BackpackWeld.Parent = Torso BackpackWeld.Name = "BackpackWeld" BackpackWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -1) end end)
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip)
function onUnequip() Torso = Character.Torso
local Backpack = Torso:FindFirstChild("Backpack") print("Backpack: ", Backpack)
if Backpack ~= nil then print("Taketh away") Backpack:Destroy() end
end Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip)

--ParaRocket
local function waitForChild(parent, child) while parent:FindFirstChild(child) == nil do wait() end return parent[child] end
local Rocket = script.Parent
local Thrust = waitForChild(script, "Thrust") local Pop = waitForChild(script, "Pop") local Tag = waitForChild(Rocket, "AttachedPlayer") local Explosion = waitForChild(script, "Explosion")
local function CalculateCharacterMass(Character) local Children = Character:GetChildren() local TotalMass = 0 for i = 1, #Children do if Children[i]:IsA("Part") then TotalMass = TotalMass + Children[i]:GetMass() end end return TotalMass end
--Creates a random number of particles and lets them fall down from the sky. local function ParticleExplosion(Parent, Colors) local NumParticles = math.random(20,25) for i = 0, NumParticles do --Create the parts for the particles to emit from local ParticlePoint = Instance.new("Part") ParticlePoint.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) ParticlePoint.Parent = Parent ParticlePoint.Position = Parent.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-5,5), math.random(4, 7), math.random(-5,5) ) ParticlePoint.Transparency = 1
--Create the particles for display local Particle = Instance.new("Fire") local Color = Colors[math.random(1, #Colors)] Particle.Color = Color Particle.SecondaryColor = Color Particle.Parent = ParticlePoint
--Send them flying local ParticleForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") ParticleForce.Parent = ParticlePoint ParticleForce.force = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20), 40, math.random(-20,20)) * 7 game.Debris:AddItem(ParticleForce, .3)
game.Debris:AddItem(ParticlePoint, 2 + math.random()) end
end
function ExplodeRocket() Rocket.Transparency = 1 Rocket.CanCollide = false Rocket.Anchored = true Rocket.RocketEffect:Destroy()
Explosion:Play()
ParticleExplosion(Rocket, { Color3.new(1,0,0), Color3.new(1,1,1), Color3.new(0,0,1) }) end
local function Fly() --Add some force to the rocket to make it fly local UpForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") UpForce.Parent = Rocket UpForce.Name = "RocketThrust"
local EffectCenter = Instance.new("Part") EffectCenter.CanCollide = false EffectCenter.Transparency = 1 EffectCenter.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) EffectCenter.CFrame = Rocket.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, -4, 0) EffectCenter.Name = "RocketEffect" EffectCenter.Parent = Rocket
local EffectWeld = Instance.new("Weld") EffectWeld.Part0 = EffectCenter EffectWeld.Part1 = Rocket EffectWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -4, 0) EffectWeld.Parent = EffectCenter
local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Parent = EffectCenter Fire.Name = "RocketFire"
--local CharMass = CalculateCharacterMass(Tag.Value) local CharMass = Tag.Value.Torso:GetMass() * .75 Thrust:Play() --Fly the direction we are pointing
for i = 1, 30 do UpForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * Rocket:GetMass() * CharMass * 98 * 1 wait(.1) end
wait(1) delay(1, ExplodeRocket) end
local function DropPlayer()
local Character = Tag.Value local Backpack = Character.Torso:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if(Backpack == nil) then -- They took off their parachute. GG wait(1) Character.Humanoid:TakeDamage(100) --Kill them for their stupidity return end
Rocket.Weld:Destroy() Pop:Play()
Character.Torso.Backpack.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85027689"
local FallForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") FallForce.Name = "Parachute" FallForce.Parent = Character.Torso
for i = 1, 35 do FallForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) * Character.Torso:GetMass() * 6 * 98 * 2 wait(.1) end
FallForce:Destroy() Character.Torso.Backpack.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=85027479"
end
Fly()
DropPlayer()
